Product Name: Oneplus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic
Review: Good looking, giid quality product. Charges fast and lasts long. Works decent even on lower volume levels although voice quality could be a little softer. The bluetooth range is a bit of an issue as if one moves from one room to another the sound turns robotic for the listener. Overall satisfied with the product.

Product Name: Oneplus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic
Review: Very good product, highly recommend

Product Name: Oneplus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic
Review: Good quality, little bigger the end of the neck band because of a bigger battery. Sound and noise cancelation better than previous model. Ear tips smaller and lighter, for me hold really good even running, better bass and treble.

Product Name: Oneplus Bullets Z2 Bluetooth Wireless in Ear Earphones with Mic
Review: Bought these for the 2-3 hours a week I am at the gym and the battery life is good. The fit is good and the design is nice in my opinion, very slim and light weight.

Product Name: Elgato Wave:3, Premium USB Condenser Microphone and Digital Mixing Solution, Anti-Clipping Technology, Capacitive Mute, Strea
Review: It is very good and everything is good in it

Product Name: Elgato Wave:3, Premium USB Condenser Microphone and Digital Mixing Solution, Anti-Clipping Technology, Capacitive Mute, Strea
Review: after reserching for about 6 months I decided to buy this over AT2020, it is offering more than any other mic out there in 2023 also for begnniers I think it is a safe option.

Product Name: Elgato Wave:3, Premium USB Condenser Microphone and Digital Mixing Solution, Anti-Clipping Technology, Capacitive Mute, Strea
Review: The audio quality for recording, streaming, video calls over skype and discord are amazing. there is noise cancelling available via software but no build in noise cancelling. With that being said. you don't need the software to run this microphone. This can function really well even as a simple plug and play device. Has a really nice mute button, gain control on the microphone is a feature that all mic manufacturers should look into and implement. Overall my experience with this mic is excellent. I mean for 15k it better be excellent.

Product Name: Elgato Wave:3, Premium USB Condenser Microphone and Digital Mixing Solution, Anti-Clipping Technology, Capacitive Mute, Strea
Review: Very Nice  Product Microphone + Use Wawe Link Software 0% Noise Remove

Product Name: Elgato Wave:3, Premium USB Condenser Microphone and Digital Mixing Solution, Anti-Clipping Technology, Capacitive Mute, Strea
Review: This is hands down a really good mic for beginners and enthusiasts on who want a high end-mid range mic. The reason why this mic is flexible with its audio is because the Solocast or Hypercast which are also pretty good mics do not offer any software support directly from their end and the Wave 3 has Elgato software directly built in so you could directly just plug and play with your stream or even any calls.

Review: This radio is perfect! Perfect small size. Easy to use. Love being able to charge instead of constantly changing (and buying batteries). Great tone quality. Ability to use with or without ear plugs. A great radio.
